questions.question: Taking place on May 2, 2015, which horse won the 2015 Kentucky Derby?
As part of a settlement involving copyright infringement lawsuits, which streaming music service closed down in May 2015?
Which party won the 2015 General Election in the UK on May 8th, 2015?
EGS-zs8-1 was discovered in May of 2015. What is it?
John Kerry became the first leading figure in US politics to visit which nation since 1993?
Lindsey Vonn announced her split from which major sports star in May of 2015?
May 2015 marked what anniversary since the sinking of the British ocean liner RMSLusitania?
South Korea signed a free trade agreement with which nation in May of 2015?
Stephen Curry was announced as the MVP in what sport for the 2014-2015 season?
The last prescription pill bottle belonging to this celebrity before his death was auctioned for $10,000 in May of 2015.
What was the first name given to the royal baby born in May of 2015?
Which day in May is known as Star Wars Day?
Which nation banned unmarried couples from riding bikes together in May of 2015?
Irish singer-songwriter and U2 front man Bono celebrated what birthday on May 10th of 2015?
A gun attack took place at an awards ceremony for cartoons of Mohammed in which US State in May of 2015?
Alex Dowsett broke the one-hour record in which sport in 2015?
A UN world happiness study declared which nation was the happiest place to live?
The i20 car is the latest model from which car company?
Who announced he is now officially a woman in 2015?
